## QueryDefinition.dependencies property

Optional array of vies keys that the query handler depends upon.

These views will automatically be synced to the current version just before the query handler is executed and are made available via the `view` function (second argument of [QueryExecFunc](./paramodel.queryexecfunc.md)<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dependencies: Dependencies;
```
